subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Hall of Fame selectors will decide whether to enshrine Art Modell, who moved his team from Cleveland to Baltimore in 1996, angering Browns fans, but helped the N.F.L. to prominence.
snippet: Hall of Fame selectors will decide whether to enshrine Art Modell, who moved his team from Cleveland to Baltimore in 1996, angering Browns fans, but helped the N.F.L. to prominence.
